description: Activated when actor feels intense anger with suppressed agency, but still has some fight/hope left (not despair).
actor_description: Heat climbs up my neck and into my face. I want to move, to force an outcome—anything—but the moment won’t give me purchase. I swallow it down and keep looking for the one lever that might still exist.
description_text: {actor} goes unnaturally still, jaw set hard enough to show in the tendons. The anger doesn’t spill—it's packed tight, held behind clenched teeth, waiting for a crack in the situation.

alternate_descriptions.auditory: I hear a breath held too long, then released in a controlled, careful exhale—like someone biting back words.
